snippet: A 90-year-old convicted Nazi war criminal claims that the journalists violated his privacy by using a hidden camera to record an interview with him.
abstract: A 90-year-old convicted Nazi war criminal claims that the journalists violated his privacy by using a hidden camera to record an interview with him.
lead_paragraph: Two Dutch reporters have been ordered to appear in a German court this week, following a complaint from a 90-year-old convicted Nazi war criminal who claims that the journalists violated his privacy by using a hidden camera to record an interview with him.

headline.main: Reporters Accused of Violating Nazi War Criminal's Privacy to Be Tried in Germany

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
